entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
